00076 struct TVectorFields
00077 {
00078    int offsets[4];
00079    int num;
00080 };

00082 //
00083 // Set of helper functions to help parse and build the tree.
00084 //
00085 class TInfoSink;
00086 class TIntermediate
00087 {
00088 public:    
00089    POOL_ALLOCATOR_NEW_DELETE(GlobalPoolAllocator)
00090 
00091    TIntermediate(TInfoSink& i) : infoSink(i)
00092    {
00093    }
00094    TIntermSymbol* addSymbol(int Id, const TString&, const TType&, TSourceLoc);
00095    TIntermSymbol* addSymbol(int id, const TString& name, const TTypeInfo *info, const TType& type, TSourceLoc line);
00096    TIntermTyped* addConversion(TOperator, const TType&, TIntermTyped*);
00097    TIntermTyped* addBinaryMath(TOperator op, TIntermTyped* left, TIntermTyped* right, TSourceLoc, TSymbolTable&);
00098    TIntermTyped* addAssign(TOperator op, TIntermTyped* left, TIntermTyped* right, TSourceLoc);
00099    TIntermTyped* addIndex(TOperator op, TIntermTyped* base, TIntermTyped* index, TSourceLoc);
00100    TIntermTyped* addUnaryMath(TOperator op, TIntermNode* child, TSourceLoc, TSymbolTable&);
00101    TIntermAggregate* growAggregate(TIntermNode* left, TIntermNode* right, TSourceLoc);
00102    TIntermAggregate* makeAggregate(TIntermNode* node, TSourceLoc);
00103    TIntermAggregate* setAggregateOperator(TIntermNode*, TOperator, TSourceLoc);
00104    TIntermNode*  addSelection(TIntermTyped* cond, TIntermNodePair code, TSourceLoc);
00105    TIntermTyped* addSelection(TIntermTyped* cond, TIntermTyped* trueBlock, TIntermTyped* falseBlock, TSourceLoc);
00106    TIntermTyped* addComma(TIntermTyped* left, TIntermTyped* right, TSourceLoc);
00107    TIntermConstantUnion* addConstantUnion(constUnion*, const TType&, TSourceLoc);
00108    TIntermTyped* promoteConstantUnion(TBasicType, TIntermConstantUnion*) ;
00109    bool parseConstTree(TSourceLoc, TIntermNode*, constUnion*, TOperator, TSymbolTable&, TType, bool singleConstantParam = false);        
00110    TIntermNode* addLoop(TIntermNode*, TIntermTyped*, TIntermTyped*, bool testFirst, TSourceLoc);
00111    TIntermBranch* addBranch(TOperator, TSourceLoc);
00112    TIntermBranch* addBranch(TOperator, TIntermTyped*, TSourceLoc);
00113    TIntermTyped* addSwizzle(TVectorFields&, TSourceLoc);
00114    bool postProcess(TIntermNode*, EShLanguage);
00115    void remove(TIntermNode*);
00116    void outputTree(TIntermNode*);
00117 
00118 protected:
00119    TInfoSink& infoSink;
00120 
00121 private:
00122    void operator=(TIntermediate&); // prevent assignments
00123 };
